sections.heading: When prescribed incidental or third party demand is not barredAn incidental demand is not barred by prescription or peremption if it was not barred at the time the main demand was filed and is filed within ninety days of date of service of main demand or in the case of a third party defendant within
sections.text: When prescribed incidental or third party demand is not barredAn incidental demand is not barred by prescription or peremption if it was not barred at the time the main demand was filed and is filed within ninety days of date of service of main demand or in the case of a third party defendant within ninety days from service of process of the third party demand.Added by Acts 1970, No. 472, ยง1. Amended by Acts 1974, No. 86, ยง1; Redesignated from C.C.P. Art. 1067 by Acts 2017, No. 419, ยง5.
